name: @atendesimples/call-tracking
description: A simple and lightweight library to use call tracking feature by Atende Simples
author: Thadeu Esteves<tadeuu@gmail.com>

scripts.test:watch: cross-env NODE_ENV=test npx vitest watch run --coverage
scripts.build:staging: rm -rf pack && cross-env NODE_ENV=staging npx webpack --config webpack.config.js
scripts.build:prod: rm -rf pack && cross-env NODE_ENV=production npx webpack --config webpack.config.js
scripts.git-push: git push origin HEAD && git push --tags
scripts.release:staging: npm run -s build:staging -s && npm run -s git-push
scripts.release:prod: npm run -s build:prod -s && npm run -s git-push
